text: Curious George is a children's book written and illustrated by Margret Rey and H. A. Rey, and published by Houghton Mifflin in 1941.Curious George on goodreads.com It is the first book in the Curious George series and tells the story of a monkey called George and his adventures with the Man with the Yellow Hat. ==References== Category:American children's books Category:1941 books
title: Curious George (book)
